name: Clone Ship
description:
My first attempt at a game jam :)

Made for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022

Theme: "Death is only the beginning"

W to speed up

S to slow down

A/D/Q/E to roll

Space to enable/disable mouse steering

Left Mouse Button to shoot

Web Build v1.1.0.1 Changes:

  • Corrected cursor size

v1.1 Changes:

  • Fixed display on widescreen monitors
  • Corrected player weapon aim
  • Retuned enemy numbers & max health
